email_subject: Quarterly Managing Director Meeting - Monday, October 22
email_body: Please plan to attend the Quarterly Managing Director Meeting scheduled for Monday, October 22. An agenda will be distributed at the meeting. Meeting details are as follows: Monday, October 22 8:30 - Noon Hyatt Regency Dogwood Room (located on the 3rd floor) A video connection will be made from the London office. Please call if you have any questions. Joannie 3-1769
